Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28638089]HCV(Hepatitis C virus):inhibition of HCVcc infection in Huh7.5/CD81 cells (IC50=1~5nM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.28638089]have no effect on the viability of Huh7.5-CD81 cells at concentrations of 10 nM
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: Inhibits HCV entry at the post-attachment step and block cell-to-cell transmission, inhibit the late steps of HCV life cycle, such as HCV package and release.

Literature.Title: A screen for inhibitory peptides of hepatitis C virus identifies a novel entry inhibitor targeting E1 and E2.
